pips-solver/src/app/screens/builder/Step.description: Step1GridAlignment uses raw TouchableOpacity and inline styles instead of themed UI components. Contains 5 different button types (pickButton, aiButton, controlButton, newImageButton) and multiple text elements that should use the UI library.

pips-solver/src/app/components/ui/.description: UI component library added with Button (5 variants, 3 sizes, loading state), Card (4 variants with press animations), and Text components (Body, Heading, Label, Mono convenience components).

pips-solver/src/theme/.description: Theme system added with design tokens (colors, spacing, radii, shadows), typography configuration, animation utilities, React context, and styled helpers. Uses brass accent palette with obsidian/slate surfaces.
